attributes.action: Reduce hours of homework for secondary school teens
attributes.additional_details: Reduce the amount of homework that secondary school children have! How are they supposed to have 3 hours of homework a night, a job and help round the house? As well as hard as they work in class, they have to struggle at home with the amount they get! I for one agree with homework but the amount that the teenagers are getting at the moment is ridiculous, they have a social life too!
